name: Supply Master
description:
Story

Opening a new factory is HARD these days. but you managed to secure yourself a few contracts to get you going. yet with this cut-throat market, you must deliver them on time. or the consequences will be dire.

Details
  • 1280 x 720 Resolution.
  • Endless.
  • Pixel Art.
  • Alpha.
  • Made with Monogame.
Gameplay

All you Need is a Mouse.

Click on a blueprint then build it on the factory ground.

Click on Contract to redeem it if you have all the required materials.

If the timer on a Contract Expires you will lose your integrity as a factory. Too many failed Contracts and your factory will shut down.

You can Pause the game at anytime by Pressing the Space Bar.
